summary: Completed comprehensive testing of POS Car Wash System. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend is fully operational with successful login, navigation, and core POS functionality. All major features tested including shift management, transactions, customer management, and reporting.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Dashboard statistics display (revenue, transactions, memberships, low stock)
Navigation to all pages (Dashboard, Shift, Services, Customers, Memberships, Inventory, POS, Reports, Settings)
Shift management (open/close shift with cash reconciliation)
Services catalog display with proper categorization
Inventory management with HPP tracking and low stock alerts
POS transactions with cart management and payment processing
Reports page with Excel export options
Settings page with user management display
Backend API endpoints (16/16 passed - 100% success rate)
